00021 RLAlg::RLAlg(Controller* controller, Simulator* simulator, double discount, double stepSize) {
00022 
00023     this->controller = controller;
00024     this->simulator = simulator;
00025     this->stepSize = stepSize;
00026 
00027     useAutoBaseline = false;
00028 
00029     saveName = NULL;
00030     doSaves = false;
00031     epochsBetweenStepUpdates=0;
00032 
00033     controller->setDiscount(discount);
00034     controller->setStepSize(stepSize);
00035 
00036     assert(simulator->getRewardDim() != 0);
00037     baseline.resize(simulator->getRewardDim());
00038     resetLearning();
00039 
00040     // Initialise the observation class for all possible learners.
00041     // They can reinitialise if they like, but this should always be right I think.
00042     obs.init(simulator->getObsRows(),simulator->getObsCols(),simulator->getAgents(), simulator->getNumActions());
00043 
00044 }

00047 void RLAlg::resetLearning() {
00048 
00049     baseline.clear();
00050     controller->resetTrace();
00051     controller->resetParams();
00052     obs.setSteps(0);
00053 
00054 }

00073         <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"Steps"
00074         <<setw(CWIDTH)<<"R"

00080       <<setw(CWIDTH)<<avgReward
00081       <<setw(CWIDTH)<<maxParam
00082       <<setw(CWIDTH)<<seconds<< endl;

00098 double RLAlg::learn(int stepsPerEpoch, int maxTime, int ms, double maxVal) {
00099 
00100     this->maxSteps = ms;
00101     this->maxTime = maxTime;
00102     this->maxVal = maxVal;
00103 
00104     int totalSteps = 0;
00105     int secs = 0;
00106     int epoch = 0;
00107     double lastEpochVal;
00108     double lastStepCheckVal;
00109     double bestEpochVal;
00110     Vector totalRewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00111 
00112     totalRewards.clear();
00113 
00114     time_t startTime=time(NULL);
00115 
00116     bestEpochVal = lastEpochVal = doSteps(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch, false);
00117     lastStepCheckVal = bestEpochVal;
00118     // Record time so far.
00119     secs = time(NULL) - startTime;
00120     printPerformanceInfo(true, 0, lastEpochVal, controller->getMaxParam(), secs);
00121 
00122     // Just do this once at the beginning.
00123     controller->resetTrace();
00124     
00125     while (true) {
00126         
00127         // Halting conditions.
00128         if (testForHalt(secs, totalSteps, lastEpochVal)) break;
00129         
00130         // Do one learning iteration over stepsPerEpoch
00131         lastEpochVal = learnCore(stepsPerEpoch, totalSteps);
00132                 
00133         
00134         // Record time so far.
00135         secs = time(NULL) - startTime;
00136         
00137         // Save params if better than before
00138         if (lastEpochVal > bestEpochVal) {
00139             bestEpochVal = lastEpochVal;
00140             if (doSaves) write(saveName);
00141         }
00142         
00143         printPerformanceInfo(false, 
00144                              totalSteps, 
00145                              lastEpochVal, 
00146                              controller->getMaxParam(), 
00147                              secs);
00148 
00149         if (epochsBetweenStepUpdates > 0 && epoch%epochsBetweenStepUpdates==0) {
00150             checkStepSize(lastEpochVal, bestEpochVal, lastStepCheckVal);
00151             lastStepCheckVal = lastEpochVal;
00152         }
00153 
00154         epoch++;
00155     }
00156     
00157     return lastEpochVal;
00158     
00159 }

00161 
00170 bool RLAlg::testForHalt(time_t secs, int steps, double val) {
00171 
00172         // Halting conditions
00173         if (maxTime && secs >= maxTime) return true;
00174         if (maxSteps && steps >= maxSteps) return true;
00175         if (maxVal && val >= maxVal) return true;
00176         return false;
00177 }

00186 double RLAlg::learnCore(int stepsPerEpoch, int& totalSteps) {
00187 
00188     double lastEpochVal;
00189     Vector totalRewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00190     totalRewards.clear();
00191 
00192     // Learn
00193     lastEpochVal = doSteps(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch, true);
00194     totalSteps += stepsPerEpoch;
00195     if (useAutoBaseline) {
00196         baseline.assign(totalRewards);
00197     }
00198 
00199     return lastEpochVal;
00200 
00201 }

00211     doSaves = true;
00212 
00213 }

00220 void RLAlg::write(char* fname) {
00221 
00222     ofstream o(fname);
00223     if (o.is_open()) {
00224         controller->write(o);
00225         o.close();
00226     }
00227     else cout<<"!! Failed to open "<<fname<<" for write\n";
00228 
00229 }

00238 void RLAlg::read(char* fname) {
00239 
00240     ifstream o(fname);
00241     if (o.is_open()) {
00242         controller->read(o);
00243         o.close();
00244     }
00245     else {
00246         cout<<"!! Failed to open "<<fname<<" for read\n";
00247         exit(EXIT_FAILURE);
00248     }
00249 }

00263 void RLAlg::checkStepSize(double curr, double best, double last) {
00264 
00265     // We should only be doing this if user requested auto
00266     // step size updates
00267     assert(epochsBetweenStepUpdates > 0); 
00268 
00269     if (curr < best/(1.0 + threshold)) {
00270         // We've gotten substantially worse. Panic!
00271         stepSize/=decreaseFactor;
00272         controller->setStepSize(stepSize);
00273         cout<<"Policy getting worse. Step size decreased to "<<stepSize;
00274         if (saveName != NULL) {
00275             // Load the last best parameters if they are around
00276             read(saveName);
00277             cout<<" and best parameters restored";
00278         }
00279         cout<<endl;
00280         return;
00281     }
00282     
00283     
00284     if (curr < last*(1.0 + threshold)) {
00285         // We're learning too slowly. Speed up.
00286         stepSize*=increaseFactor;
00287         controller->setStepSize(stepSize);
00288         cout<<"Policy improving too slowly. Step size increased to "<<stepSize<<endl;
00289         return;
00290     }
00291         
00292 
00293 }

00299 void RLAlg::restoreBestParameters(){
00300     if (saveName != NULL) {
00301         read(saveName);
00302         cout<<"Best parameters restored";
00303     }
00304     else
00305         cout<<"No best parameters to restore !";
00306     cout<<endl;
00307     return;
00308 }

00328 double RLAlg::evaluate(Vector&totalRewards, int steps) {
00329 
00330     Observation obs(simulator->getObsRows(),
00331                     simulator->getObsCols(),
00332                     simulator->getAgents(),
00333                     simulator->getNumActions());
00334     Vector action(simulator->getActionDim());
00335     Vector rewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00336     
00337     totalRewards.clear();
00338 
00339     for (int s = 0; s < steps; s++) {
00340         simulator->getObservation(obs);
00341         // Must do next line before calling getAction() since
00342         // getAction will accumulate log action gradients into the
00343         // trace directly for efficiency.
00344         controller->getMostProbAction(obs, action);
00345         simulator->doAction(action); 
00346         simulator->getReward(rewards);
00347         totalRewards += rewards;
00348     }
00349 
00350     totalRewards /= steps;
00351 
00352     return norm_1(totalRewards)/simulator->getRewardDim();
00353 
00354 }
00355 
00356 
00361 double RLAlg::evaluateAndPrint(int stepsPerEpoch, int maxSteps) {
00362 
00363     double val;
00364     Vector totalRewards(simulator->getRewardDim());
00365 
00366     totalRewards.clear();
00367 
00368     time_t startTime=time(NULL);
00369 
00370     //cout<<setprecision(PRECISION);
00371   
00372      val = evaluate(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch);
00373      //printPerformanceInfo(true, 0, 0, 0, 0);  
00374       printPerformanceInfo(true, 0, val, controller->getMaxParam(), time(NULL) - startTime);  
00375     int totalSteps = stepsPerEpoch;
00376     while(!(maxSteps && totalSteps >= maxSteps)) {
00377         val = evaluate(totalRewards, stepsPerEpoch);
00378         printPerformanceInfo(false, totalSteps, val, controller->getMaxParam(), time(NULL) - startTime);  
00379         totalSteps += stepsPerEpoch;
00380       }
00381       return val;
00382 }
